parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response. Default value: **zh**. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: The pagination token. It can be used in the next request to retrieve a new page of results.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description:
The type of the resource. Valid values:

*   **DOMAIN**: domain name
